name: AngiePuffy Quest [Commodore 64]
description:
AngiePuffy live on a small farm with her animals.  One day a gang of villains came and took all of them. Now she needs to find and save them before they are gone for good.

Collect all the keys you can find to open the locks holding them captive. All the keys on each level is needed to unlock it and rescue the animal.

You can play the game in a C64 emulator (VICE) or you can play it on a real C64  if you know how to do so. Or you can play it on TheC64/TheC64mini.
